name: Goofy Soccer
summary: According to the author, Goofy Soccer is designed to give you total control on the ball when dribbling, passing and shooting. Having little mastery on the gameplay will give you the feeling that you are a creative play-maker since you can all set the direction, curve, height and power of your passes. Also the game supports ordinary computer assisted mode for beginners. The game is easy to play, but the harder levels can only be beaten with your great skills.
